channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: As the wealthy keep spending, here’s why the middle class is in for a tough 2025
Dow down as Wall Street’s ‘Santa Claus rally’ window is about to open
Planning a Disney vacation? Experts say use these cards to maximize your rewards.
item.description: A Disney Visa card may seem the logical choice if you’re paying for a Disney vacation, but it’s not necessarily the best one.

item.title: ‘People don’t want to smell like others anymore’—this largely unknown perfume brand doesn’t advertise, but its sales have still risen 50%
item.description: The Chinese market and Gen Z particularly like niche perfumes in contrast to other luxury goods.

item.title: Amazon and AT&T want an end to remote work: will 2025 finally be the death of WFH?
item.description: With the pandemic behind us, some executives argue that remote work has outlived its usefulness. Yet the data tells a different story.

item.title: Aviva agrees to buy U.K. insurer Direct Line for £3.7 billion
item.description: Aviva started hunting for acquisitions again after CEO Amanda Blanc pursued a series of divestments that slimmed down the insurer and left it more foc...

item.title: The race is on to buy an EV while the $7,500 tax credit is still available
To help save the climate, CEOs need to become ‘Chief Coalition Builders ’
item.description: To play their part in climate action in these turbulent times and future proof their companies, CEOs need to become effective diplomats and agents of ...

item.title: Cocoa is best-performing commodity of 2024 — even beating bitcoin. What’s next?
